alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 6:19PM CDT until November 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Southwestern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... Southeastern Sequoyah County in east central Oklahoma... Northeastern Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Roland to 4 miles north of Poteau, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Poteau... Charleston... Greenwood... Alma... Barling... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Lavaca... Spiro... Arkoma... Mulberry... Panama... Dyer... Hackett... Bonanza... Cameron... Moffett... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 23. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 315 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. Interstate 49 near mile marker 22. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Arkansas...and southeastern and east central Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
